page.title: 18A Hobby
page.content:
A hobby of mine is BMXing, it is where you ride a bike and do tricks. The tricks I do are:- wheelies, backhops, wheelhops and many more tricks. I do all the tricks at Elm Court, Potters Bar. At Elm Court there is one trick ramp and a quarterpump. I do quite a lot of maintenance on my bike like fixing punchers and getting new brake boxes. My BMX is called a Tuff Burner and it is good for stunts. I like doing BMXing, a lot of my friends do it and think it is very good. Quite a lot of people I know think BMXing is going out of fashion, but I don't.
Anthony Freer Form 1D Age: 12
